item.title: FT Most Read: Thursday, May 30, 2024 at 10:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. ‘Knives and Kalashnikovs’: violent drug gangs torment French city of Marseille
2. Nato has just 5% of air defences needed to protect eastern flank
3. US to offer Ukraine security pact as tensions rise between allies
4. Starmer faces backlash after ‘purge’ of leftwing Labour candidates
5. Hedge fund billionaire Bill Ackman likely to back Trump
item.guid: FT Most Read: Thursday, May 30, 2024 at 10:15 PM UTC
